prompts.linkTips: Click on ? icon to access the link below
prompts.favoriteLimt: The maximum number of favorites has been reached

guide.tipsContent: When you don't know how to use it, click the right mouse button to try it
guide.backContent: The guide can be found by right-clicking on the mouse button
guide.title: User Guide
guide.text1: 1. Add components: After the first installation, the 'Drag Mode' is turned on by default, at this time the components in the left drawer are selected, and dragged to the screen to complete the addition and layout of the components
guide.text2: 2. Remove components: In Drag Mode, with the component selected in the screen, drag to the trash can in the upper-right corner, or press delete/backspace to remove the component
guide.text3: 3. Exit/Close: Click the close button in the upper left corner or press the Esc key to exit 'Drag Mode'; From the right mouse button menu, you can enter the 'Component Settings', 'Drag Mode' again
guide.text6: 1. For all components: hover over the component, right-click to call up the settings menu, click 'Component Settings', you can modify the function and style
guide.text7: 2. Bookmarks: click or press the corresponding key on the keyboard by clicking the left mouse button to open the website directly; Click on the bookmark with the middle mouse button or press shift/Alt + the corresponding button to open the website when you are done

sponsor.title: Sponsor a coffee
sponsor.content: I am a personal developer, NaiveTab can not grow without your support and encouragement, if NaiveTab is helpful to you, you can sponsor it.

general.syncTimeTips: Multi-device sync settings, effective only after you sign in to your browser account
general.importSettingsTips: Import settings from a local file. If you encounter problems, please click the export configuration below to compare and merge the differences with the local files currently to be imported, and finally re import
general.exportSettingTips: It is recommended that you export your app settings regularly to prevent the loss of important data
general.clearStorageTips: If there is an exception locally, you can try to clear the local cache, this operation will not lose the synced settings
general.localBackgroundTips: Local file will not be synchronized

bookmark.dblclickKeyToOpenTips: Double-click the keyboard keys to open the bookmark
